description.narrative: The development objective is to improve the environmental conditions in participating municipalities/counties through a package of priority interventions, including upgrading and development of wastewater collection and treatment facilities, river embankment rehabilitation, solid waste management, water supply improvements, industrial pollution monitoring, and enhancement of the financial performance and efficiency of key urban environmental service agencies.

provider-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development

condition.narrative: Commencing in 2008, the wastewater companies of Gaomi, Weihai, Rizhao and Yantai to produce total revenues to permit them tobreak-even
From 2008, Gaomi WS Co. to generate revenues sufficient. to cover O&M costs (bef. depreciation), increases in working capital,debtservice, and 20 % of the avg. capital expenditures in a 3-year range
Gaomi, Qixia and Weifang to: (i) ensure completion of remedial work on involved dams, and (ii) submit satisfactory operationalplans of the dams to the Bank
Independent panel of dam safety experts to report on progress in remedial work and on the safety of the four dams
Maintain SPPMO and local PMOs throughout implementation staffed with adequate qualified personnel
To ensure any future debt can be serviced satisfactory, WW and SW Co.s will incur no additional debt w.o. Bank#s agreement.,unlessa reasonable forecast shows their debt service coverage of >= 1.3 ti
WW companies, along with the relevant Gov. agcy., take measures to ensure effective monitoring & enforcement arrangements onacceptable WW qlty. & record activities in periodic project progress report

title.narrative: Number of people in urban areas provided with access to Improved Water Sources under the project

comment.narrative: Only Gaomi county has water supply investments.

title.narrative: Improvement of water quality within participating cities/counties from Class V to Class IV

comment.narrative: This indicator was not clearly defined which brought chaos in data collection. This issue will be raised in the ICR.

title.narrative: Pollution discharge to Bohai Sea reduced

comment.narrative: It consists of : Gaomi 0.8m, Zhoucun 0.23m, Weihai 0.45m, Yantai 0.56m, Qixia, 32k, Weifang 0.2m, Zaozhuang 0.22m, heze 0.5m,Rizhao 0.5m

The project does not have any investments in tertiary treatment plant (effluent Reuse). So the data just reflects overall reusestatus in project cities: Yantai 15%, Gaomi 0, Weihai 21%, Weifang 20%,Qixia 8.8%, Zhoucun 2%, Zaozhuang 0

title.narrative: GEF Component: Volume of septage collected in Yantai (1,000 tons/year); Volume of septage jointly treated with wastewater in Yantai(1,000 tons/year)

comment.narrative: The information on the volume and number of tanks to be emptied was over-estimated at appraisal.

title.narrative: Wastewater Components: Volume of WW treated in the cities/counties (mil m3/year); Rate of WW treated in the cities/counties (%); Reduction of pollution load reaching the recipient rivers.

comment.narrative: IncludingGaomi 47 M m3/yr;Qixia 0 m3/yr;Weihai 31.4 M m3/yr;Yantai 33.4 M m3/yr; Weifang 229 M m3/yr;Zaozhuang 33.7M m3/yr;Zhoucun 27.5M m3/yr

title.narrative: Sector Dev. & Cap. Bldg.: Cost recovery ratio of WW mgmt operations (%); Cost recovery ratio of solid waste mgmt operations (%); Cost recovery ratio of water supply mgmt operations (%)
Solid Waste Component: Municipal solid waste collected and transferred to sanitary landfill (ton/year)

comment.narrative: Solid waste facility now is fully utilized in Heze and Rizhao

title.narrative: Sector Development and Capacity Building: No. of installation of online automatic monitoring stations at industrial discharge sites
Percentage of population connected to WWTPs
Rate of compliance of connected industries with discharge standards
Citizens' satisfaction with wastewater, solid waste and water supply services in participating cities/counties

comment.narrative: Surveys will be done in the first quarter of 2014

title.narrative: Percentage of population provided with solid waste services

comment.narrative: Solid waste services now cover all the original city beneficiaries identified at project appraisal. Taking the cities’ expansionareas into account, 93% of the population is provided with solid waste services.

title.narrative: Sector Development and Capacity Bldg: Public disclosure of the status of compliance of major pollution enterprises
WS Component: a) % of population with access to water supply services; b) Water prod. mil m3/year; c) Groundwater/tot. water prod. (%); d) Liters/cap./day; e) Non-revenue water as % of water prod.

comment.narrative: The target will be revised as the Huantai component has dropped.
Only for Gaomi componet, Huantai component dropped.

title.narrative: Number of water utilities that the project is supporting
Voume(mass) of COD pollution load reduction achieved under the project

comment.narrative: Including Gaomi 826 t t/y, Qixia 1670t/d, Weihai 671 t/y, Yantai 6626.2t/y, Weifang 2876t/d, Zaozhuang 5715 t/d, Zhoucun 10900 t/d
